project1_desc: A Python-based automation tool that convert a Spotify playlist to a YouTube playlist, with an option to download it.
project2_desc: An AI system using Behavior Trees in Unity to create adaptive, intelligent NPCs capable of real-time decision-making based on environmental factors.
project3_desc: An enigmatic and atmospheric Lovecraftian metroidvania...
project4_desc: A simple 2D game engine in Java, featuring game loop management, sprite rendering, collision detection, and user input handling.
project5_desc: A custom C++ physics engine inspired by Ian Millington's "Game Physics Engine Development".
project6_desc: A fast-paced strategy game where players build structures that serve both as defenses and weapons. Created for UJI Game Jam 2024.
journey_p1: Hi there! I'm Manuel, a developer with a background in Computational Mathematics and Computer Science, specializing in game development and software engineering.
journey_p2: Currently, I'm studying Computational Mathematics and always eager to learn more. When I'm not coding, I'm exploring games, reading, waching movies, or experimenting with new tech.
edu2_mobility: Mobility program at Sejong University in Seoul, South Korea, 2023 - 2024
